channel.title: My no-ip doesnt work?
channel.description:
OK so, lets start off with everything that i have done- no-ip is set up with host name and everything
Have the port exception set for the firewall
my router has been port forwarded correctly
Source is running
I have jdk 6.17
now here is the issue- I've had a server before and i had no problems with it but i got a new computer for my birthday 1/4/2010 :) and i have got everything set up to the best of my ability (I'm using windows 7 no guides for windows 7) and i am pretty sure i have everything. but for some odd reason i cannot connect with my no-ip name but i can with local host of course. No idea why it isn't working tbh. Help?
specs- 4 gigs of ram windows 7 2.2 ghz 320gig hard drive.

item.title: My no-ip doesnt work?

FYI i turned off firewall still didn’t work besides if it did i wouldn’t run a server without a firewall its just asking to get dosed or hacked.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2010, 08:09:13 pm[/size][hr]You use opera 10 v10 too? lol thats epic i love opera

item.title: My no-ip doesnt work?
item.dc:creator: @Fatal_Desire Fatal Desire
item.description:
@Fatal_Desire wrote:

Ahh. Windows 7 has became a big problem when it comes to servers. Ask around i’m sure someone knows how to. Try turning your firewall off, instead of just using the exception? Also make sure the box is checked in your no-ip box beside the ip your using. Goodluck :D.

Read full topic
